OpenSim.Region.ScriptEngine.Shared.YieldProlog.BagofAnswers Class Reference

A BagofAnswers holds answers for bagof and setof. More...

List of all members.

Classes

class  TermArrayEqualityComparer
 A TermArrayEqualityComparer implements IEqualityComparer to compare two object arrays using YP.termEqual.

Public Member Functions

void add ()
 BagofAnswers (object Template, object Goal)
 To get the free variables, split off any existential qualifiers from Goal such as the X in "X ^ f(Y)", get the set of unbound variables in Goal that are not qualifiers, then remove the unbound variables that are qualifiers as well as the unbound variables in Template.
IEnumerable< bool > result (object Bag)
 For each result, unify the _freeVariables and unify Bag with the associated bag.
IEnumerable< bool > resultArray (Variable bagArrayVariable)
 For each result, unify the _freeVariables and unify bagArrayVariable with the associated bag.
IEnumerable< bool > resultSet (object Bag)
 For each result, unify the _freeVariables and unify Bag with the associated bag which is sorted with duplicates removed, as in setof.

Static Public Member Functions

static IEnumerable< bool > bagof (object Template, object Goal, IEnumerable< bool > goalIterator, object Bag)
static IEnumerable< bool > bagofArray (object Template, object Goal, IEnumerable< bool > goalIterator, Variable bagArrayVariable)
static IEnumerable< bool > setof (object Template, object Goal, IEnumerable< bool > goalIterator, object Bag)

Detailed Description

A BagofAnswers holds answers for bagof and setof.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OpenSim.Region.ScriptEngine.Shared.YieldProlog.BagofAnswers.BagofAnswers ( object  Template,
object  Goal 
)

To get the free variables, split off any existential qualifiers from Goal such as the X in "X ^ f(Y)", get the set of unbound variables in Goal that are not qualifiers, then remove the unbound variables that are qualifiers as well as the unbound variables in Template.

Parameters:
Template 
Goal

For each result, unify the _freeVariables and unify Bag with the associated bag.

IEnumerable<bool> OpenSim.Region.ScriptEngine.Shared.YieldProlog.BagofAnswers.resultArray ( Variable  bagArrayVariable  ) 

For each result, unify the _freeVariables and unify bagArrayVariable with the associated bag.

Parameters:
bagArrayVariable this is unified with the List<object> of matches for template that corresponds to the bindings for freeVariables. Be very careful: this does not unify with a Prolog list.
Returns:
IEnumerable<bool> OpenSim.Region.ScriptEngine.Shared.YieldProlog.BagofAnswers.resultSet ( object  Bag  ) 

For each result, unify the _freeVariables and unify Bag with the associated bag which is sorted with duplicates removed, as in setof.

Parameters:
Bag
